title: Love Island bosses 'sign up ripped TV star Jay Munro to heat up winter series'
text:

Love Island bosses have already started recruiting for the winter series.

And it's claimed Instagram hunk and TV star Jay Munro has already signed himself up for some winter loving.

Jay is a good choice for the cameras as he has a foot on the showbiz ladder after landing a job on The Voice in Australia earlier this year.

ITV bosses believe Jay will prove popular in the villa because he's good looking, in good shape and sporty.

“Jay will be the one all the girls will be chasing. Just Tommy Fury, he’s a sportsman, in good shape and has dreamy looks," a source told The Daily Star .

(Image: Daily Record)

The Mirror have approached representatives for Love Island for further comment.

The footballer was said to be in the line-up for the 2019 summer series of the show which would have seen him star alongside boxer Tommy Fury.

Yet bosses decided to save him for the upcoming winter series in early 2020.

This isn't unusual for the Love Island bosses; producers had hoped to line up Amber Gill for the 2018 series but she didn't star on the show until 2019.

(Image: Daily Record)

(Image: Daily Record)

(Image: Daily Record)

Jay is a natural choice for the villa because he already has 50.8K followers to his name on Instagram .

The TV sensation boasts of a string of reality star followers including personalities of Love Island fame.

Chloe Ferry, Dom Lever, Callum Izzard and George Rain all follow his high-profile Instagram account.

Jay had started out as a footballer and he has played for Falkirk youth team, Partick Thistle and Queen of the South.

However, the hunk hung up his football boots to carve a career in modelling.

The Instagram star has littered his social media profile with pictures of his tattoos, poser selfies and shirtless holiday snaps.

Islanders will be swapped Mallorca for Cape Town, in South Africa for the winter series of Love Island.

Filming is expected to begin for the steamiest show on TV in January.

The Love Island applications will close on November 30.
description: Love Island bosses have their eye on TV sensation and Instagram hunk Jay Munro for the winter series
